net.minecraftforge.client.model.generators

クラス ExistingFileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.client.model.generators.ExistingFileHelper

  • public class ExistingFileHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Enables data providers to check if other data files currently exist. The instance provided in the GatherDataEvent utilizes the standard resources (via VanillaPack), as well as any extra resource packs passed in via the --existing argument.

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

    • メソッドの詳細

      • exists

        public boolean exists(ResourceLocation loc,
                      ResourcePackType type,
                      java.lang.String pathSuffix,
                      java.lang.String pathPrefix)
        Check if a given resource exists in the known resource packs.
        パラメータ:
        loc - the base location of the resource, e.g. "minecraft:block/stone"
        type - the type of resources to check
        pathSuffix - a string to append after the path, e.g. ".json"
        pathPrefix - a string to append before the path, before a slash, e.g. "models"
        戻り値:
        true if the resource exists in any pack, false otherwise

      • getResource

        public IResource getResource(ResourceLocation loc,
                             ResourcePackType type,
                             java.lang.String pathSuffix,
                             java.lang.String pathPrefix)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        例外:
        java.io.IOException

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        戻り値:
        true if validation is enabled, false otherwise
